attachments.description: List of attachment ids that belong to the comment.

author_id.description: The user id of the author (default: current actor). If a user other than the current actor is specified, the current actor requires the legacy permission `POST_COMMENTS_IMPERSONATE`.

external_id.description: Can be used for customer side identification of a comment. Should be unique.

language.description: Language of the comment body represented as string compliant with ISO 639-1 norm. In case the language is not supported, the field will be ignored.

mentioned_user_ids.description: The list of user IDs of users mentioned in the comment.

published_at.description: The timestamp of the publishing of the comment. If not provided, will be set to the time of the comment creation. The timestamp is formatted as full ISO 8601 e.g. `2021-12-20T10:33:52Z`.

quoted_comment_id.description: ID of the comment, that the newly created comment is responding to. If not provided, the comment will be a top level comment.
